Name: Shapechange
Description: Hero transforms into a dragon for 2 turns

Special_retrictions: Can only be used once per battle
Creator: Lord Onichan

Summon 3 hounds of the Arcana with the higher aligment to player at Heros Level for 2 turns, Hounds have haste +2
Aries = Reaver Demons
Ivory = Fenris MK IV

Darkness +1 if Demons summoned
Wisdom +1 if Fenris summoned
